reviewText: The show is 5 starts,  but Amazon doesn't let you know you need a region free DVD player to watch. Be weary when you purchase DVDs from out of country on Amazon.  I spent 50.00 after getting DVDs  on a LG region free DVD player in order to watch what I purchased. Amazon is a scam to spend more money on a DVD player to watch.
